```{r install.packages, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(quarto)
library(dplyr)
library(devtools)
library(readr)
library(gt) #for tables
library(stringr)
library(htmltools)
library(data.table)
```

```{r load_data, echo = FALSE}
data2018 <- readRDS("data/PINCommEngData (2).RData")

data2018_06_13 <- data2018 %>% 
  filter(RunDate == "2018-06-13")
```

## Lab Report Header {.smaller}

Run Date: `r unique(data2018_06_13$RunDate)`

Run Code: `r unique(data2018_06_13$RunCode)`

Site Code: `r unique(data2018_06_13$SiteCode)`

```{r}
data2018_06_13 %>% 
  select(RunCode, SiteCode, Collectors) %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  data.table()
```
